DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , phase II study evaluate efficacy safety biweekly docetaxel DeGramont regimen unresectable gastric adenocarcinoma first-line therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Dose-dense Biweekly Docetaxel Combined With 5-fluorouracil First-line Treatment Advanced Gastric Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Primary endpoint : Overall Response Rate Secondary endpoint : Time progression , overall survival , safety data
